summary.Title: HiFi Klubben is looking for a .NET developer – e-commerce/Omnichannel
summary.JobHeadline: HiFi Klubben is looking for a .NET developer – e-commerce/Omnichannel
summary.Presentation: At HiFi Klubben we always strive to give our customers the best possible customer service and unique hifi experiences, whether they meet us in our stores or digitally. We are already well on our wa

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: HiFi Klubben is looking for a .NET developer – e-commerce/Omnichannel
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
At HiFi Klubben we always strive to give our customers the best possible customer service and unique hifi experiences, whether they meet us in our stores or digitally. We are already well on our way, but we have even bigger ambitions - and therefore we are looking for you.

About the job
As a .NET Developer in HiFi Klubben, you get freedom and responsibilities right away. You will be developing features and integrations for our demanding and specialized digital commerce solution. In this job, you will have the best of both worlds: Commercially and technically skilled colleagues in HiFi Klubben’s omnichannel team – and some of the more experienced .NET developers in Denmark as your day-to-day peers and colleagues via our partner.

Our omnichannel team consists of avid e-commerce profiles who think digital commerce from dusk till dawn. They design and plan the best possible user experience, describe new, interesting features and scope advanced integrations to other systems. You will help them succeed.

On the development side, you will work as an integrated part of our distributed team of developers sitting in Aarhus, Copenhagen and even Portugal. You will work with the latest technologies, and you will have the opportunity to dig into our solution and immerse yourself in its technologies and architecture.

Your profile
You have at least two years of experience in development in .NET and .Net Core - and you have experience from other projects that might have a scent of digital commerce. You don’t need to have 10 years of seniority and several projects in your belt, but we expect a high level of professional pride, where you constantly seek to improve the quality of your own and others' work.
The important part for us, is that you actively take responsibility for your own development tasks – while still paying attention to the overall architecture

Technology:
Our tech stack currently relies on InRiver (PIM) and Elastic search to deliver data. Episerver/Optimizely is used as a headless CMS, delivering to the frontend through microservices. Frontend is a single-page application based on React and SCSS. Everything is Azure based on microservices, app services and functions with CloudFlare CDN in front. We use Jira, Octopus-deploy, Git etc. In other words, we have plenty of buzzwords.

As .NET Developer, we also expect you to…

  • Know about SCRUM processes and that you are used to working agile.
  • Have experience in developing micro-services and microservice oriented architecture.
  • Know your way around Azure which we use for our entire environment.
  • Have experience with relational databases and in developing websites with a lot of integrations.
  • Be focused on details and take pride in performing a task on time and in good quality

We offer:

  • Salary according to your qualifications, seniority and experience.
  • A challenging job in an informal environment where you will find a short distance from idea to action.
  • Strong professional sparring and the opportunity for personal development in an award-winning omnichannel team with many years of e-commerce experience.
  • The possibility to work close to some of the best .NET developers in Denmark via our partner setup.
  • Possibility to work both from home and from our offices in Lystrup.
  • A great place to learn about digital projects and e-commerce.

In addition, we offer attractive benefits such as flexible working hours, health insurance, pension, lunch arrangement, and solid employee discounts on great sound.

About HiFi Klubben
HiFi Klubben is Europe's largest retailer within high-quality hi-fi sound and picture and we have an annual turnover of more than DKK 1.3 billion DKK. We have approx. 92 stores across Denmark, Norway, Sweden, the Netherlands, and Germany as well as five national online stores. With a hand-picked product range and support from a competent and committed store staff, customers can always find the right solution for their specific needs.

The company's head office is located in Lystrup - approx. 10 kilometers north of Aarhus in a brand new and inspiring office space at OfficeLab.

Place of work
Lyshøjen 10A, 8520 Lystrup

Questions?
If you have any questions about the position or working in HiFi Klubben in general, feel free to contact Director of Omnichannel, Morten Qvistgaard at mqv@hifiklubben.com.

Submit your application as soon as possible
If you believe you are the perfect match for us and you want a great job with lots of development potential, don't hesitate to click apply or reach out.

Application deadline
We regularly take candidates for interview and are happy to wait for the right one.

Application
Please submit your application online
